author: William Worrall
title: UK Coronavirus Deaths Top 2,000 as 1 in 8 Selfish Residents Ignore Lockdown
description: Despite the massive global damage, 1 in 8 Britons aren't taking anti-Coronavirus measures seriously and that is a huge problem. They will be at fault if the lockdown lasts another six months. The post UK Coronavirus Deaths Top 2,000 as 1 in 8 Selfish Resident…
content:
• A recent poll found that 1 in 8 people in Britain are ignoring the Coronavirus lockdown.
  • These people are still going out and interacting with people from other households.
  • These are the people that will make the 6-month-long lockdown … [+1850 chars]
